alert.note: Alert for Roscommon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 1:47PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Roscommon County through 230 PM EDT... At 147 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Roscommon County Airport, or over Prudenville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... South Higgins Lake around 205 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Lake St. Helen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
